wikipedia_page.main: Kevin William Mooney (born 23 August 1959) is an English footballer who played as a defender in the Football League for Tranmere Rovers. He had previously played for Bangor City, Bury and Telford United.In 2017, Mooney was part of a successful campaign with the England team to win the Seniors World Cup in Thailand. This was his sixth World Cup appearance and third time of winning the Seniors World Cup for England.
